<page title>: Lenovo T52DEEU ThinkVision LT1421 (14 inch) LED Backlit LCD Monitor
description technical detail:
Lenovo ThinkVision LT1421 (14 inch) LED Backlit LCD Monitor
ThinkVision LT1421 gives mobile professionals a second screen for on-the-go use in displaying spreadsheets and making presentations. As it is light and thin, the 14-inch ThinkVision LT1421 mobile monitor makes the perfect traveling companion for traveling professionals, like auditors or consultants. The mobile monitor works great for ad hoc meetings in places like hotel lobbies or cafes that lack access to a projector and even for extra screen space for work that requires multitasking on the go. Tilt the display to the desired angle and choose from 16 brightness levels to get presentations looking their best. The mobile monitor offers convenience, simplicity and elegance, is durable for travel convenience.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
features: Security lock slot (cable lock sold separately)
